ground_truth.thought: 提供一些基于投资者情绪的投资建议
ground_truth.name: PolygonFinance.provide_investment_advice

origin_prompt.content:
你是一个可以使用外部工具的助手。你可以调用以下的工具:
[{'name': 'BINGMap.get_coordinates', 'description': 'Get the coordinates of a location.', 'required_parameters': [{'name': 'location', 'type': 'STRING', 'description': 'the location need to get coordinates.'}], 'optional_parameters': [], 'return_data': [{'name': 'latitude', 'description': 'the latitude of the location.'}, {'name': 'longitude', 'description': 'the longitude of the location.'}]}, {'name': 'GoogleScholar.get_citation_format', 'description': "get APA citation format by an identification of organic result's id", 'required_parameters': [{'name': 'q', 'type': 'STRING', 'description': 'ID of an individual Google Scholar organic search result'}], 'optional_parameters': [], 'return_data': [{'name': 'citation', 'description': 'the citation format of the article'}]}, {'name': 'BINGMap.search_nearby', 'description': 'Search for places nearby a location, within a given radius, and return the results into a list. Put the location name at the end of the query.', 'required_parameters': [{'name': 'search_term', 'type': 'STRING', 'description': 'the place name'}], 'optional_parameters': [{'name': 'places', 'type': 'STRING', 'description': 'the name of the location.'}, {'name': 'latitude', 'type': 'FLOAT', 'description': 'the latitude of the location.'}, {'name': 'longitude', 'type': 'FLOAT', 'description': 'the longitude of the location.'}, {'name': 'radius', 'type': 'NUMBER', 'description': 'radius in meters.'}], 'return_data': [{'name': 'places', 'description': 'the list of places, each place is a dict with name and address, at most 5 places.'}]}, {'name': 'PolygonFinance.get_ticker_detail', 'description': 'Get a single ticker supported by Polygon.io, with detailed information about the ticker and the company behind it', 'required_parameters': [{'name': 'ticker', 'type': 'STRING', 'description': ''}], 'optional_parameters': [], 'return_data': [{'name': 'address', 'description': 'company address'}, {'name': 'homepage_url', 'description': ''}, {'name': 'description', 'description': 'A description of the company and what they do/offer'}, {'name': 'list_date', 'description': 'The date that the symbol was first publicly listed'}, {'name': 'name', 'description': 'The name of the asset'}]}, {'name': 'PolygonFinance.search_stock_ticker', 'description': 'get the stock ticker given the company name', 'required_parameters': [{'name': 'search', 'type': 'STRING', 'description': 'search for terms within the ticker and/or company name'}], 'optional_parameters': [], 'return_data': [{'name': 'ticker', 'description': 'The exchange symbol that this item is traded under'}, {'name': 'name', 'description': 'The name of the asset'}]}, {'name': 'PolygonFinance.get_investor_sentiment_index', 'description': 'Get the latest investor sentiment index for a specific market.', 'required_parameters': [{'name': 'market', 'type': 'STRING', 'description': 'the market need to get investor sentiment index.'}], 'optional_parameters': [], 'return_data': [{'name': 'sentiment_index', 'description': 'the latest investor sentiment index.'}]}]
如果你已经知道答案，请调用FinishAction来提供最终的回复。
我是一名金融分析师，我想了解A股市场的投资者情绪。首先，获取最新的投资者情绪指数。接着，分析这些指数对A股市场的影响。然后，比较不同行业的投资者情绪。最后，提供一些基于投资者情绪的投资建议。当前这一步的目标是什么?
获取最新的投资者情绪指数
当前这一步要调用的工具名称是什么?
PolygonFinance.get_investor_sentiment_index
当前工具的参数'market'的值是什么?
A股市场
{'sentiment_index': '0.75'}

接下来要调用的工具的参数为：{'sentiment_index': '0.75'}
请回答以下问题：当前这一步的目标是什么?
分析这些指数对A股市场的影响
当前这一步要调用的工具名称是什么?
PolygonFinance.analyze_sentiment_impact
当前工具的参数'sentiment_index'的值是什么?
{'impact_analysis': 'Positive sentiment index indicates a bullish market outlook.'}

接下来要调用的工具的参数为：{'impact_analysis': 'Positive sentiment index indicates a bullish market outlook.'}
请回答以下问题：当前这一步的目标是什么?
比较不同行业的投资者情绪
当前这一步要调用的工具名称是什么?
PolygonFinance.compare_industry_sentiment
当前工具的参数'market'的值是什么?
A股市场
{'industry_comparison': 'Technology sector shows the highest sentiment index at 0.85, while Energy sector shows the lowest at 0.60.'}

接下来要调用的工具的参数为：{'industry_comparison': 'Technology sector shows the highest sentiment index at 0.85, while Energy sector shows the lowest at 0.60.'}
请回答以下问题：当前这一步的目标是什么?

prediction: 提供不同行业的投资者情绪比较。
